function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Epidemics and pandemics leading to public response and increased stress levels","category":"Family","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Conflict of interest declaration is missing","category":"Accountability","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Mass unemployment and increase in home working","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of recognition of the important role of individual choice and actions in delivering socially desired transport outcomes in a post-covid world.","category":"People","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Individuals not following public health guidelines","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Panic buying and hoarding in supermarkets","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Financial support for the aviation industry granted without strict environmental conditions","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Resistance to change in global transport policies and planning","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for local cultural and religious practices during travel increases the risk of cultural transmission of contagious diseases.","category":"Visitors","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Reduction in the provision of quality public and active transport alternatives due to veneration of private car","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Encouraging individual responsibility for personal actions can create a false sense of security and lead to complacency in following public health guidelines.","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate consideration of social equity and accessibility in responsible transport policies may exacerbate health disparities and increase the risk of contagious diseases in marginalized communities.","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of cooperation and coordination in international policy making","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of political trust, transparency, and action leading to ineffective disease containment efforts.","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reluctance to embrace individual responsibility for public health and welfare, hindering disease containment efforts.","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Polarized and negative news coverage of the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sustained exposure to negative covid-19 news causing stress and desensitisation","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decreasing interest and avoidance of covid-19 news","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of information on vaccination status","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Presence of pre-existing medical
